index.name: Designer's Guide
index.tagline: A collection of guides for designers creating performant interactions using the Mobify Platform.

instant-page-transitions.title: Instant Page Transitions
instant-page-transitions.intro: Learn how to create instant page transitions, where shared content from multiple pages in the PWA are rendered immediately.

placeholder-design.title: Placeholder Design
placeholder-design.intro: Make your site feel even faster than it is with Mobify's Skeleton component placeholders.

performant-product-loading-strategy.title: Performant Product Loading Strategy
performant-product-loading-strategy.intro: Use lazy loading and other tactics to build a performant product loading strategy for your PWA.

offline-mode-experience.title: Offline Mode Experience
offline-mode-experience.intro: Design a great Offline Mode experience for users with spotty or slow network connections.

add-to-home-screen.title: Add to Home Screen
add-to-home-screen.intro: The Add to Home Screen feature allows users to add the Progressive Web App (PWA) to their device.

full-screen-mode.title: Full Screen Mode
full-screen-mode.intro: Design a great Full Screen Mode experience to help users feel fully immersed in your site.
